column3: Latest;Kampong Thom: According to CMAC director Heng Ratana
column4: a farmer in Kampong Svay district
column5: Kampong Thom found a stash of old mortar rounds while going about his business. Afraid that local kids might play with them
column6: the farmer stuck them up a tree to keep them out of harm’s way.------However
column7: this wasn’t the best course of action
column8: and very dangerous. The farmer was advised about the dangers of UXO’s and CMAC along with the local police disposed of the explosives safely.
